name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of special pictures about June 4th.
Part Three (May 15)
[Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement] [On the third day of the hunger strike, 800,000 citizens expressed support]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contribution from the owner of Sunac Center in Qingdao West Coast New Area: We just want a normal life.

Hello, teacher, please forgive me for not having any pictures or video materials in this submission, because there are too many materials but I cannot express the anger, pain, despair, helplessness and anxiety in my heart concretely. Origin:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 3 a.m., students from Anhui University Jianghuai College held a meeting with their leaders. When the students mentioned that during the day, unidentified people drove a police car to block the students at the door and almost beat them up, the live broadcast was cut off midway.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 15, at the Geneva Summit on Human Rights and Democracy, Xia Chaochuan @karasu_ga_warau spoke as a witness to the White Paper Movement, describing her experience of being arrested twice for the White Paper Movement and the repression she faced while engaging in feminist and LGBT activism in China.
“They want us to forget.
They want us to turn a blind eye to what is happening in our own land.
More importantly, they want us to live in fear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @karasu_ga_warau

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Eb70Y46FFL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xia Chaochuan @karasu_ga_warau on Halloween in Shanghai

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens began to recall China ten years ago

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 16, the Weibo topic #Tianshui Malatang stores began to close in droves# became a hot search.
In March this year, Tianshui Malatang became a new top-tier store, comparable to last year's Zibo barbecue. Under the temptation of huge traffic, Tianshui Malatang has also become a hot entrepreneurial project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/a1drWJJLhy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of May 17, the official WeChat account of Hangzhou Qianjiang Real Estate Market live broadcast the rights protection of unfinished building owners

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 16, in Lianyungang, Jiangsu, blogger "Kuangbiao Brothers" posted a video saying that he encountered a ghost scale when buying seafood at the Lianyungang Seafood and Vegetable Direct Sales Market, and then the market manager snatched his phone and asked him to delete the video.
At noon on the 17th, the official announcement stated that the merchant involved had been cleared out and the staff who snatched the phone had been dismissed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 16, in Chengdu, Sichuan, a doctor who resigned from Hanhe Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine reported the hospital's doctors, saying, "How can the hospital charge money if the patient is cured in just three to five days?"
The hospital staff responded that they were interns sent by other companies. The local Health and Construction Commission said it would verify and investigate the hospital as soon as possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 16, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Because the school district of Shenzhen Middle School Longhua School did not include Yicheng Center Community, the children in the community could not go to school nearby. That night, parents took to the streets to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 16, Shenyang, Liaoning. On October 21, 2021, a gas explosion occurred in a hotel on South Qima Road, Taiyuan South Street. However, the gas company’s resettlement and compensation for the damaged merchants have not yet been implemented. People came to the gas company to defend their rights and seek an explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 16, Puyang, Henan. Puyang Municipal People's Congress Representative Song Yaping said that some people in society currently have some prejudices and misunderstandings about urban management work, and hoped that everyone would understand urban management work more.
After the video was released, it triggered ridicule from netizens. Due to too many negative comments, the video has enabled the "only allow fans to comment" function.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/89Gb7E9pAU

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 16, Liaoning. A woman posted a video saying that she was going to be a regular employee, but was verbally dismissed by the company because she did not work overtime on Saturday.
Later, after the company learned that she had applied for labor arbitration, it called and threatened her, "It's useless for you to apply for arbitration now. Think about whether you can find a job in the future."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 16, Hefei, Anhui. Because Anhui Radio and Television Media Group owed suppliers money, suppliers sat in Anhui Radio and Television Media Group and slept on the floor to collect debts.
It is understood that Anhui Radio and Television Group Jiajia Shopping issued a bankruptcy announcement on April 28. It also owed suppliers money from January to April 24. Suppliers questioned why the company still allowed suppliers to ship goods before bankruptcy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 15, Yunnan Nujiang Transportation Group issued a notice stating that the group had entered the bankruptcy liquidation procedure on August 31, 2023. After approval from the transportation authority, the company decided to temporarily suspend operations on all operating routes from June 1, 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 16, some owners reported that the Baojia Building in Shenyang’s “Evergrande Four Seasons Shangdong” community was a shoddy project.
In the video, the sewer is half blocked and the owner cannot reach in. The tiles on the roadside can be lifted with bare hands. Another part of the tiles was dug under and it was found to be a shaft covered by wooden boards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 8, on the streets of Beijing, a woman was forcibly carried into a car and taken away by several unidentified people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Yes, we have become numb to "interception of visits" and even think it is "natural" to see such scenes.
But when we change the way of description, perhaps we can realize what is happening in this video: a woman was openly lifted into a car and taken away on the streets of China's most heavily guarded city, and her whereabouts are unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 17, Dalian, Liaoning, Huaxin Trust collapsed, and investors went to the company's building to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 17, the U.S. Embassy in China’s official account published a statement from a U.S. State Department spokesperson on the Zhang Zhan case: 
We are deeply concerned about citizen journalist Zhang Zhan, who was sentenced to four years in prison for reporting on the COVID-19 outbreak in Wuhan and disappeared after being released from Shanghai Women’s Prison on May 13. 
We call on China to respect Zhang Zhan’s human rights and stop the restrictive measures she and all journalists face.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/cnHPWXL2KW

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/g2TnVEwrS1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As we approach the 35th anniversary of June 4th, human rights in China @hrichina
, Humane China @HChina89 cooperated to release the fourth of a series of June Fourth special pictures (May 16) [Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement] [700 people fainted on hunger strike] [Fighting for press freedom] [Zhao Ziyang reveals shocking secrets]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @hrichina @HChina89 5. Hundreds of thousands of people gathered in Tiananmen Square every day to support the students. 6. When Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev visited, students also made signs to welcome him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the second season of the popular TV series "Celebrating More Than Years" was launched.
Because Li Wenliang had expressed his hope to see the sequel of "Celebrating More Than Years", a large number of netizens flocked to Li Wenliang's comment area to mourn him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 16, Lou Ye's new film "An Unfinished Film" caused a huge response on Weibo after its premiere in Cannes. The film, in the form of a pseudo-documentary, tells the story of a film crew in Wuhan during the outbreak of the new coronavirus in early 2020. 
Almost every blogger who has watched the movie said that they were heartbroken and had mixed feelings.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the screening, there was prolonged applause from the audience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Vz9QKqOv3T
